sms_conf_msg:
You have to verify your phone number, we have sent you a confirmation code via SMS, please enter it here then click on Verify

Please note that you have to write your phone with the country code, if you did not do that, please click cancel and edit the number
whats_conf_msg:
You have to verify your phone number, we have sent you a confirmation code via whatsApp Message, please enter it here then click on Verify

Please note that you have to write your phone with the country code, if you did not do that, please click cancel and edit the number
